citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
The attending veterinarian determined that a principal investigator had collected nasal swabs from 25 lambs; however,
this sample collection was not described in the approved IACUC protocol.
The facility shall ensure that all proposals to conduct activity involving animals include a complete description of the
proposed use of the animals. It is essential that this information be included in the proposal to ensure the judicious and
humane use of the animals. Corrected prior to the inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives.
n

narrative:
2.31(e)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
The attending veterinarian determined that a principal investigator had collected nasal swabs from 25 lambs; however, 
this sample collection was not described in the approved IACUC protocol.  
 
The facility shall ensure that all proposals to conduct activity involving animals include a complete description of the 
proposed use of the animals. It is essential that this information be included in the proposal to ensure the judicious and 
humane use of the animals. Corrected prior to the inspection. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representatives. 
 
 n

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
